title: Result Type Pattern
description:
Create a sealed Result type for operation outcomes:
- record Success(String message)
- record Failure(String error)

Write a method that returns Success or Failure based on a condition.
Print appropriate message using pattern matching.

Test: If input > 0, return Success("Positive"), else Failure("Not positive")
Input: 5
Expected output: Success: Positive
instructions:
Create a sealed Result type for operation outcomes:
- record Success(String message)
- record Failure(String error)

Write a method that returns Success or Failure based on a condition.
Print appropriate message using pattern matching.

hints.text: Define: sealed interface Result permits Success, Failure {}
Use records for both variants: record Success(String message) implements Result {}

commonMistakes.correction: Records are perfect for sealed type variants - use them!
